name: Balcony Stories
description:
Balcony Stories:

Featuring: the fat guy, the student, the dj, the cheff, the crazy cat lady, the boxer, the TV guy and the suspicious person.

Match 2 of them on one floor to try to find the conections between them. 

Try to find the 6 different newspaper endings. GL.

Credits:

Alberto Aguilar: Programmer
